sentences:
Anarchy Reigns , known in Japan as , is an open world beat 'em up video game developed by PlatinumGames , published by Sega , produced by Atsushi Inaba , and directed by Masaki Yamanaka .
It is a spiritual sequel to the Wii video game MadWorld , and was released on July 5 , 2012 in Japan , but the planned simultaneous release in North America , Europe , and Australia is said " to be confirmed " by Sega on May 25 .
On June 18 , Sega confirmed via Twitter that the game would be released in North America and Europe in March 2013 , but on October 19 , 2012 , Sega announced that it would be released in North America on January 8 , in Australia on January 10 , and in Europe on January 11 , 2013 .
